name: BlaubergHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on ventilation in office”
”Alexa, set the fan speed to fifty percent”
”Alexa, what is the current fan humidity level”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With Blauberg Home Skill you will be able to interact with your Blauberg ventilation devices via simple voice commands. In addition, Alexa lets you to create automation scenarios to interact your Blauberg ventilation devices with other Smart Home devices different brands.

To get started, add Blauberg ventilation devices to Amazon Alexa App:
1. Download and install the Blauberg Home App from App Store or Google Play Store.
2. Create a new Blauberg account and log in.
3. Add Blauberg ventilation devices to Blauberg Home App.
4. In the Amazon Alexa App search Blauberg Home Skill and click enable it.
5. You will then be prompted to sign in using your Blauberg Home user credentials to link your Blauberg Home account with Alexa.
6. In the Amazon Alexa App you can assign your Blauberg devices to the rooms or can rename the devices you want to control. Please consider using simple names.
7. All setup is done. You can use your voice to turn on/off the unit(s), change modes, ask the current status, monitor and change the temperature or other available parameters.

If you later add new devices to the Blauberg Home App, you can automatically use them with Alexa.

After setting up the system, try these commands in order to test your connection between Alexa and your Blauberg equipment:
• Alexa, turn on ventilation in the office
• Alexa, set the Freshpoint to first speed
• Alexa, set the AHU speed to 50 percent
• Alexa, set the Vento speed mode to maximum
• Alexa, what is the current speed mode on the AHU?
• Alexa, enable heating temp mode on the AHU
• Alexa, enable fan only temp mode on the AHU
• Alexa, set the AHU temp mode to cooling
• Alexa, set the AHU temp mode to auto
• Alexa, enable heater on the Freshpoint
• Alexa, set the AHU bypass to open
• Alexa, set the AHU bypass to close
• Alexa, set the AHU bypass to auto
• Alexa, set direction mode to recuperation on the Vento
• Alexa, set direction mode to supply on the Vento
• Alexa, set the AHU temperature to 20 degrees
• Alexa, increase the AHU temperature
• Alexa, reduce the AHU temperature
• Alexa, what is the current AHU temperature?
• Alexa, set the Freshpoint humidity to 50 percent
• Alexa, what is the current Freshpoint humidity level?
• Alexa, set the AHU CO2 to 600
• Alexa, what is the current Freshpoint CO2 level?
• Alexa, turn on the schedule mode on the Vento
• Alexa, turn on the night timer on the Vento
• Alexa, turn on the party timer on the Vento
• Alexa, turn off the timer mode on the Vento
• Alexa, what is the current AHU air filter state?
• Alexa, what is the current Vento battery state?
